name: SHBLÜH
description:
Color-based runner in a five tiles long world.

Developed by TeamZBLAH by 4 peoples for Ludum Dare 38.

  • Sylvain Barbaza (Portfolio) : Game Designer / Programmer
  • Emmanuel Blanc (Artstation): 3D Artist
  • Alexandre Lattavo (Portfolio) : Game Designer / Programmer
  • Hugo Willems (Portfolio / Artstation) : 3D Artist
